title: Ranger Spells
content: pell Slot Touch a creature to grant it protection against poisonous influences.You neutralise all poisons affecting it, grant it Advantage on Saving Throws against being Poisoned, and grant it Resistance to Poison damage.Until Long Rest Melee Silence Lv 2 Illusion ActionLevel 2 Spell Slot Create a sound-proof sphere. All within are Silenced and Immune to Thunder damage.100 turnsUsing this spell might turn targets hostile.Range: 18m Concentration Spike Growth Lv 2 Transmutation ActionLevel 2 Spel
